summary: The script implements a full pipeline for link prediction on the OGBL dataset using the SEAL framework. It loads the dataset, extracts and labels subgraphs around candidate edges with a double‑radius sampler, defines a dynamic graph convolutional neural network (DGCNN) to embed subgraphs, trains the model with binary cross‑entropy loss, and evaluates performance using Hits@K and MRR metrics.
business_intent: Provide a reproducible benchmark and reference implementation for graph link prediction research, showcasing how subgraph extraction, node labeling, and dynamic graph convolutions can be combined to achieve state‑of‑the‑art results on large-scale OGB datasets.
